text: Tell me everything you see happening. I'm just kidding. Mmm, the girl is watching the boy go into the cooking jar. He has a cookie in his hand. He's on the stool. The stool is falling. . Your mother is drying dishes. Has a plate in her hand. Sink is overflowing. There's water on the floor. She's stepping in the water. . Something that's going on, you said. Mm-hmm. . The little girl looks like she's motioning to the boy we want. long silence The woman's looking out the window. Okay, I'm going to go in.
